description:
Personal Assistant at Endorse Infinity

Location: Los Angeles, CA

Salary: $45,000 - $65,000 per year

Are you ready to embark on a dynamic career journey as a Personal Assistant in the heart of Los Angeles? Endorse Infinity is seeking an exceptional individual to join our team and support one of our key executives. This role isn't just about administrative tasks; it's about being the right hand to a leader, ensuring smooth operations, and contributing to the success of a rapidly growing company.

Job Description: As a Personal Assistant at Endorse Infinity, you will be at the epicenter of our operations, providing crucial support to our executive team. Your responsibilities will include:

  • Calendar Management: Efficiently managing schedules, appointments, and meetings to optimize productivity.
  • Travel Coordination: Arranging travel itineraries, accommodations, and logistics for business trips.
  • Communication Liaison: Serving as a primary point of contact, handling correspondence, and fielding inquiries.
  • Document Preparation: Drafting and proofreading documents, presentations, and reports with meticulous attention to detail.
  • Task Prioritization: Anticipating needs and proactively addressing priorities to ensure smooth workflows.
  • Event Coordination: Assisting in the planning and execution of company events, meetings, and conferences.

Qualifications: To thrive in this role, you should possess the following qualifications:

  • Exceptional Organization: Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and maintain a high level of organization in a fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills with a professional demeanor.
  • Discretion and Confidentiality: Demonstrated ability to handle sensitive information with discretion and maintain confidentiality.
  • Tech-Savviness: Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and familiarity with scheduling software.
  • Resourcefulness: Proactive problem-solving skills and the ability to adapt to evolving priorities.
  • Previous Experience: Prior experience as an executive assistant or personal assistant is preferred but not required.

Benefits: Joining Endorse Infinity comes with a range of benefits designed to support your professional growth and well-being, including:

  • Competitive Salary: Earn a competitive salary within the range of $45,000 - $65,000 per year, commensurate with experience and qualifications.
  • Healthcare Coverage: Access to comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance plans to support your well-being.
  • Professional Development: Opportunities for ongoing training, skill development, and career advancement within our dynamic organization.
  • Work-Life Balance: Flexible work hours and a supportive work environment that promotes work-life balance.
  • Company Culture: Join a collaborative team of professionals who value creativity, innovation, and excellence.
